mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PRODUCT_INFO (PRODUCT_INFO_ID, PRODUCT_ID, M_ID, JOIN_DATE, ACCOUNT_NUMBER, BALANCE) VALUES (PRODUCT_INFO_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{product_id}, #{m_id}, SYSDATE, #{account_number}, #{balance})
